projects.title: IEEE Research Publication
projects.description: Co-authored a research paper published to IEEE Xplore, contributing to the advancement of electrical engineering and telecommunications research. This achievement represents significant contribution to the academic community.
details: Co-authored peer-reviewed research paper in telecommunications field
Conducted extensive literature review and comparative analysis
Developed novel approaches to wireless communication challenges
Collaborated with senior researchers and academic professionals
challenges: Complex technical concepts required thorough understanding and explanation
Rigorous peer review process demanded multiple revisions and improvements
Coordination with multiple co-authors across different institutions
projects.impact: This publication contributes to the global knowledge base in telecommunications and has been cited by other researchers, advancing the field of wireless communications.

projects.title: E-waste Computer Recycling Initiative
projects.description: Developed comprehensive sustainable solutions for repurposing electronic waste into functional computers for educational institutions in underserved communities. Managed complete lifecycle from hardware refurbishment to OS installation.
details: Established systematic process for e-waste collection and sorting
Developed refurbishment protocols for various computer components
Created installation procedures for multiple operating systems
Implemented quality assurance testing for refurbished systems
challenges: Working with outdated and damaged hardware components
Ensuring consistent performance across refurbished systems
Coordinating distribution to remote educational institutions
projects.impact: Successfully provided 100+ functional computers to schools in underserved communities, directly impacting over 2,000 students' access to digital education.

projects.title: IoT Applications Development
projects.description: Created embedded systems and IoT solutions for various real-world applications, focusing on practical implementations of smart technology in agricultural, environmental, and urban contexts.
details: Developed sensor networks for agricultural monitoring
Created environmental data collection systems
Implemented wireless communication protocols for remote monitoring
Designed user-friendly interfaces for data visualization
challenges: Ensuring reliable wireless communication in remote areas
Power management for battery-operated sensor nodes
Data accuracy and calibration of multiple sensor types
projects.impact: Currently deployed in 5+ locations, providing real-time monitoring capabilities that have improved decision-making for agricultural and environmental management.

projects.title: Green Hub E-mobility Research
projects.description: Contributed to research on electric vehicle technology and sustainable transportation solutions for urban environments in Kampala, analyzing feasibility and implementation strategies.
details: Conducted feasibility analysis for electric vehicle adoption in Kampala
Researched charging infrastructure requirements and placement strategies
Analyzed economic and environmental impact of e-mobility solutions
Developed recommendations for policy makers and stakeholders
challenges: Limited existing data on electric vehicle usage in Uganda
Balancing economic viability with environmental benefits
projects.impact: Research findings contributed to policy discussions on sustainable transportation and informed infrastructure planning for electric vehicle adoption in Kampala.

projects.title: Telecommunications Research
projects.description: Conducted advanced research in wireless communication systems and signal processing at The Marconi Laboratory, contributing to innovations in modern telecommunications infrastructure.
details: Developed novel signal processing algorithms for wireless systems
Conducted extensive simulation and testing of communication protocols
Contributed to research on 5G and beyond communication technologies
Collaborated with international research teams on telecommunications projects
challenges: Complex mathematical modeling of wireless communication systems
Staying current with rapidly evolving telecommunications standards
